Series.Overview: Oliver Queen and his father are lost at sea when their luxury yacht sinks. His father doesn't survive. Oliver survives on an uncharted island for five years learning to fight, but also learning about his father's corruption and unscrupulous business dealings. He returns to civilization a changed man, determined to put things right. He disguises himself with the hood of one of his mysterious island mentors, arms himself with a bow and sets about hunting down the men and women who have corrupted his city.

Action-adventure series based on the novel by Robert Louis Stevenson set during the Wars of the Roses.
The 2nd and 3rd series are stories featuring character(s) from the novel by Robert Louis Stevenson. The series was made by Southern Television for the ITV Network.

Series.SeriesName: Arrow Emblem Grand Prix no Taka
